scripts.bower: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r lib/*.js ./dist
scripts.babel: npm run clean && shx cp -r src lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel lib --out-dir lib && shx rm -f lib/*.mjs
scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c -w
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=true rollup -c
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bower
